readlater.description: Pakistan's Opposition leader Maryam Nawaz on Saturday lashed out at Prime Minister Imran Khan for lavishing praise on India, saying he should go to the neighbouring country if he likes it so much.
Bangalore News Today Updates, Bangalore Today, Karnataka Live News, Bengaluru, Karnataka Today News Live, 9 Apr: Al-Qaeda indulging in polarisation in India, says Congress

Russia Ukraine War News Today, Russia Ukraine Strike News Updates:  Meanwhile, Ukraine’s Ministry of Defence on Saturday accused Russian forces of leaving behind ‘tormented bodies’ in the town of Makariv in the Kyiv region.
Beast movie review: Stating Thalapathy Vijay has done 'an incredibly good job', a UAE-based critic wrote 'there's never a dull moment' in the film.
